A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually beautiful\, the actors did a wonderful job with what they were given\, but the multiple plot lines fell flat. They had a lot of good they could have done\, and in the end\, it just felt unfinished and poorly exectuted. \n\nI will be disappointed if the writer/director (they were the same person) isn't blacklisted for the utter crap they inflicted on me and my wife. We're both huge fans of the original trilogy and the expanded universe.
